entity_name: MicroPette Plus Fully Autoclavable Fixed Volume Mechanical Pipette
description:
Introducing the MicroPette Plus - a high-performance manual pipette designed for exceptional comfort and ease of use.
Ergonomic Design: With a light touch plunger, relaxed finger rest, and an overall user-friendly design, the MicroPette Plus is designed to make pipetting more comfortable and efficient.
Volume Range: The MicroPette Plus offers a volume range of 5 μl to 5000 μl, with a total of 12 fixed volume settings.
Rotating Counter Knob: The MicroPette Plus features an easy-to-use rotating counter knob and digital display, allowing for quick and accurate volume setting, with the volume range clearly visible in the digital display.
High-Quality Materials: The MicroPette Plus is made of high-quality heat-resistant materials, allowing it to be autoclaved or UV-disinfected without disassembly. Its design is also resistant to harsh chemicals.
Quick Release Pipette Tip Ejector: The MicroPette Plus features a quick-release pipette tip ejector, making it easy to switch between different tips.
Maintenance: The MicroPette Plus's components are easily replaceable and can be calibrated and maintained using standard tools in the laboratory. It also has ISO 9001:2008 and ISO 13485:2003 certificates, as well as CE marking.
Online Calibration: The MicroPette Plus can be calibrated online via the official website, ensuring that it is always in top working condition.
Overall, the MicroPette Plus is a reliable, easy-to-use, and versatile manual pipette that is perfect for various laboratory applications. With its ergonomic design, intuitive controls, and high-quality materials, the MicroPette Plus is the ideal choice for any laboratory looking for a reliable and efficient pipette. MaxMed UAE is the leading supplier of Lab Essentials (Tubes, Pipettes, Glassware) in Dubai and across the United Arab Emirates. We provide professional Lab Essentials (Tubes, Pipettes, Glassware) with same-day quotes, fast delivery, installation support, and comprehensive after-sales service. Contact us at +971 55 460 2500 for expert consultation and competitive pricing.
